description: A mod that automatically hits a configurable deafen keybind when you reach a certain percentage. Configurable per-level.
name: AutoDeafen

Enabled by Default.description: Whether AutoDeafen is <co>enabled by default</c> when you load into a level for the first time. Basically enables AutoDeafen globally rather than per-level.

Default Percentage.description: The <co>default percentage to deafen at</c> when you load into a level for the first time.
